greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest squarefree number k with exactly n prime factors such that the sum the prime factors is divisible by the largest prime dividing k, or 0 if no such k exists.
comment: No solution exists for n=2, so a(2)=0.
formula: A008472(k)/A006530(k) is integer; k is squarefree and has exactly n prime factors.
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, May 13 2002
ext: Corrected and extended by _Donovan Johnson_, Apr 22 2008
Name corrected by _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Jul 08 2018
